daily_summary.headline: Exciting Space Activities Await: Launches and Aurora Insights

top_events.title: Aurora Forecast: G1 Storm Expected
top_events.description: A G1 geomagnetic storm is predicted, offering potential aurora visibility at high latitudes.
top_events.action: Check aurora visibility at high latitudes.

top_events.title: SpaceX Starlink Launch
top_events.description: Routine launch of Starlink satellites by SpaceX, continuing the expansion of the satellite internet constellation.
top_events.action: Watch live stream for launch details.

top_events.title: Rocket Lab's HASTE Mission
top_events.description: Rocket Lab's HASTE mission with a hypersonic vehicle payload, marking another step in hypersonic research.

opportunities.recommendation: Possible aurora at high latitudes. Best for northern locations (65°+). Worth checking if conditions are optimal.
